title: Why cant they design something unique....
body:
This add... was it just me?
{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
This one is even worse XD

http://i.imgur.com/37e7hXq.jpg

League might not have a lot of things, but we do have a badass design team. I guess people get jelly and resort to copying.

funny part is, when you look up those games in images, their "adds" never appear, for instance that lies of Astaroth one you have with maokai, there is no trace of league, but hundred of pictures of shit like this... 
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/lies-of-astaroth/images/b/b8/The_Sirius.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140428061726

how do they call those games... ask me all that shits just glorified hentai. stay away from it
